title: I unable to attempt full paper of my IPCC exams, will I pass? - Quora

response.answer_text: ICAI board gives importance to Quality of Answer not for the Quantity of Answer. you saying that :unable to attempt full question paper. for Qualifying exam no need to attempt full paper. For example your target attempt to 80% of question paper. you can write exam very focused and relaxed with out any tensionsyou can focus to give Quality of Answers because time is Sufficient.you can focus on well presentation of Answers Neatly without any mistakes.you can feel satisfy for your self what you have done in exam,insted of giving attemt to 100% of Question paper with clumsy answers .the above said factors only for who people saying that I am disqualifying exam only because of unable to attempt 100% Question paper.Not for the Rankers. .kindly ignore mistakes if any. thank you
